Name: nya-alhajiyusufmuha
Author: Al Haji Yusuf Muhammad Kanyamula
Source: http://goodwordbooks.com/, Goodword Books, Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africa

Translations.Text: Chimodzimodzi palibe Mtumwi amene adadza kwa anthu amene sadamunenere mawu ofanana monga akuti: “Wamatsenga kapena munthu wopenga!”
Kodi uwu ndi mwambo umene akhala ali kusiyirana wina ndi mnzake? Iyayi, iwo ndi anthu amene ali kuswa malamulo mopyola muyeso
Kotero uwaleke chifukwa iwe ulibe mlandu
Ndipo kumbutsa chifukwa chikumbutso chimathandiza anthu okhulupirira
Ndipo Ine ndidalenga majini ndi anthu kuti azindipembedza Ine
Ine sindiwapempha chakudya ndipo sindiwafunsa kuti azindidyetsa Ine
Ndithudi ndi Mulungu yekha amene amapereka chakudya chonse, Mwini mphamvu zonse ndi wolimba kwambiri
Ndithudi anthu onse olakwa adzalandira gawo longa limene anzawo olakwa akale adalandira, kotero asandifunse Ine kuchita mofulumira
Kotero tsoka kwa onse osakhulupirira kuchokera ku tsiku lomwe iwo alonjezedwa
Ndi pali phiri
Ndi pali Buku lolemekezeka
Lili chikopa chosapinda
Ndi pali Bait – Ul-Ma’mur (Nyumba imene ili kumwamba yolingana ndi Kaaba imene ili ku Makka ndipo imaonedwa ndi angelo pafupipafupi)
Ndi pali denga lonyamuka
Ndi pali nyanja yodzadzidwa ndi madzi ambiri
Ndithudi chilango cha Ambuye wako chidzakwaniritsidwa
Palibe wina amene angachiletse
Pa tsiku limeneli, kumwamba kudzagwedezeka koopsa
Ndipo mapiri adzagudubuzika osakhalanso china chake
Kotero tsoka, patsiku limeneli kwa anthu abodza
Amene amatangwanika ndi mabodza
Patsikuli iwo adzatengedwa ndi kuponyedwa mwamphamvu ku moto wa ku Gahena
Uwu ndi moto umene mumati ndi bodza
